title: Why does the Android build fail with Unity IAP and AdMob?

sections.title: Symptoms
content:
• My Android build is failing
  • I am using both Unity IAP and AdMob.

sections.title: Cause
content: Both Unity IAP and AdMob include the in-app-billing-service-aidl.jar, resulting in two copies of the file. The Android build fails since it is unable to resolve the duplication.

sections.title: Resolution
content: Delete one of the copies of the file "in-app-billing-service-aidl.jar" from your project and the build should work.
